ron paul lab notes lsd for this work you will need sterile glove box laminar flow box. 
the laminar flow boxes are expensive but make things much much easier the sterile glove box can made from glass aquarium. 
take peice cardboard and make lid then cut glove holes. 
tape plastic tubes like for keeping umbrella dry onto these holes. 
this way when you put your gloved hands through the plastic and the holes you can rubberband the plastic your arms for very decent seal. 
make sure that when you buy find your aquarium that big enough. 
its very frustrating work small one. 
the next thing you need large pressure cooker. 
would suggest quart think its the kind that can just barely fit quart mason jars. 
anything larger then this can only fit few more jars for much higher price. 
starting with freeze dried material take minimal amount from the vial whatever and place sabouraud agar potato dextrose agar works but the strain will degrade this medium over time. 
reports state that the strain will actually not degrade sba after decent length time. 
you can also make buy your sba with gentamicin sulfate antibiotic this would allow you just about open air work but not really good idea but covers your bases. 
better antibiotic would but has added after sterilization not heat stable gent. 
the ratios for agar for these two antibiotics are and gentamicin. 
once you have plated the starting material you should have plate full growth week days but this really temperature dependant. 
the optimal temperature around degrees. 
now you need homoginize the material you could buy stainless steel waring blender like they use the papers for hundreds dollars you could the grocery store walmart and take look their cheap blenders. 
the bases these blenders are standard thread size you can actually find pint canning jar with narrow neck and screw into the blender base. 
you have small magic bullet looking thing. 
would reccomend that you bend the blender blades downward this way instead needing mls liquid blend decently you can blend with like which becomes important. 
its not easy bend the blades careful. 
now you have very cheap tissue homognizer. 
you can sterilize this your pressure cooker the plastic base can take cookings before warps consider these disposible and get few off ebay something. 
when you sterilize make sure with maybe mls water this way you can have nice clean sterile water exactly where you need. 
take your petri dish and put your glovebox with your homoginizer and sterile scalpel well syringe. 
using sba take small chunk from the dish and place the homoginizer then seal. 
using pda you might well use the whole thing since will degraded month when you want start your next cycle. 
take the homoginzer and blend until seems well. 
suck this liquid with the syringe minus the needle doesnt get clogged. 
cap the syringe with luer lock cap and put plastic bag the fridge for later. 
now you want make your seed culture containers. 
these should made out quart jars with square shape not totally round. 
the reason that the square shape actually acts like baffled flask. 
get some express priority envelopes from the post office the kind that are made tyvek they should say cradle cradle them some other recycling term. 
cut out square just bigger then the jar mouth and put blob silicoln. 
while this drying mix your seed culture medium. 
recomended mixture per liter solution mannitol glucose succinic acid mgso. 
with aqueous ammonia naohnot mandatory past this point pluronik polyethoxy increases yields added after sterilzation gentamicin added before fine the silicoln dry and the medium made then place around into each quart jar. 
you want about volume your production culture seed culture. 
for liters you need around quart jars with each. 
put them pressure cooker and let them cook for minutes start counting once reaches psi. 
once the jars are cooled from pressure cooking inject equal amount from the syringe into each the jars through the silicoln blob. 
alternitivly you have large amount freeze dried material you can homoginize this and inject directly into the jars the process will take little longer. 
now you are going need keep these jars and have them orbital shaker around rpm with inch displacement. 
orbital shakers are expensive hell but are good investment for this hobby there another way you are handy. 
pretty much what you get rpm motor bunch pulleys that are around are mounted peice wood plastic metal. 
they are mounted close possible without touching circle. 
then the motor mounted the shaft comes through the base. 
the shaft attached small hub the diameter this hub compared the diameter whole circle what determines your speed. 
speed motor rpm inches diameter hub speed ring inches diamter ring. 
this small hub coupled the pulleys with rubber belt either flexible belt used tensioning mechanism added. 
you want keep your rpms around rpm per one jar optimally. 
the room cold you need keep the temperature constant with adjustible heating blanket. 
the reason you can use magnetic stirrer because causes sheer forces which will destroy the mycelium. 
what you need shaking well aeration which you will get the containers spin with their tyvek tops. 
also the shaking action promotes the mycelium forming nice aggregates mycelium. 
you want bunch tiny round balls not fine goopy cultures cultures with giant masses the oxygen cant get through. 
whatever option you use you can test make sure you arent limiting growth not having enough aeration. 
buy one those ampule test kits for dissolved oxygen think kits for these high levels are rarer but they are sold online decently cheap. 
just run the setup with nutrients once without any fungus and test the levels few times over the course few days. 
the levels should percent. 
also you can use microscope with magnification and put few drops the seed culture before transfer onto slide. 
you damaged the mycelium did not the seed culture properly you will see long stringy peices properly developed culture will look like bunch aggregates little balls this means the mycelium swelled form the parasitic high producing form. 
another way use sterilized oxygen source like for the production medium but this will require male male barb going through the jar lids sealed well. 
you can even use the same air source for your production medium well your seed cultures just requires lot tubing which becomes pain and the whole setup looks like some alien dope lab you can get away with the other types setups slapping some beer brewing stickers and having some empty beer bottles etc around. 
once you introduce your culture you will let the setup brew for days. 
this the optimal temperature kept exactly. 
its higher the fungus will need harvested faster and yields will much lower colder will longer. 
you want get fancy you could try and titrate using the iodine back titration test for when levels glucose drop off. 
you may also able use diebetic glucose monitor there info about hacking these online. 
about day after glucose used the perfect time transfer. 
for this tutorial your production stage vessel should gallon plastic glass carboy which should contain about gallons liters medium. 
will need cork lid with male male barbs going through. 
one barb will only have small length tubing full polyfill for the exhaust. 
the other will have tube leading down the largest airstone you can fit your sterilizer easily. 
the airstone tubes and lid should put into quart jars and sterilized beforehand. 
sterilize the carboy can either use ipa high strength pool and then pull strong vaccuum you can just swish alcohol around pour most out and then add the medium you just have make sure bubble the medium for extra hours before you add fungus evaporate the alcohol. 
production medium per liter solution mannitol succinic acid mgso. 
with aqueous ammonia naohnot mandatory past this point pluronik polyethoxy increases yields added after sterilzation gentamicin added before fine antibioticsfor the airsource you should aim for air medium minute but you can get away with maybe. 
for gallons liquid you need around gallon per minute pump. 
its good idea test the dissolved oxygen and maybe even alkaloid content every once while jabbing syringe through silicoln blob cover tiny hole the side the container during fermentation. 
testing the will let you know where your pump stands. 
the pump should housed large ammo box any other hermatically sealed box. 
this can lined with foam lower noise long your pump wont overheat. 
for large setup you can totally seal the pump box with foam spray insulation something and use computer watercooling radiator and homemade waterjacket cool. 
maybe thermal cutoff sensor you know your pump will overheat without cooling box. 
the box should have basic filter doesnt need hepa but should decent. 
should have male male barb glued through for the clean air come out. 
filter the air you need metal tube about around and like long. 
should have hose barbs each end and have the ability unscrew the ends. 
maybe find plumbing fittings even buy nice inline dryer something like that off ebay. 
get some fine glass wool and pack the hell out the tube you want restrict the airflow decent amount but not enough kill your pump. 
try match the restriction airstone. 
seal the tube and sterilize quart jar. 
this tube should filter out and catch most the particles that through. 
your real worry not the tiny bacteria since you will probably using antibiotics and established culture can take care itself. 
large fungus spores fragments will get caught this which why you should resterilize before every use. 
sterilize your production medium you need just fill your pressure cooker with the medium very careful not put too much. 
maybe the volume your pressure cooker time. 
putting this much water your pressure cooker makes more dangerous then canning. 
make sure not let fall off the stove because all the water will flash evaporate pops open and could fuck your day. 
let this run the standard then cool. 
many pressure cookers have rubber grommet holding the blowout valve once the cooker cools you can pull out the grommet and quickly cover the hole with something. 
get this pressure cooker and your sterilized carboy into clean area and stick sterilized tube and polyfill into the grommet hole. 
attach this tube sterilized siphon starter squeeze bulb and then tube the barb where the exhaust tube goes. 
start siphon and get most the the liquid into your carboy then repeat until you have enough. 
this works well and doesnt take too long but wont work the gallon level. 
this becomes pain and you want scale there are other methods. 
you can fill few gallon carboy with seed culture medium and then use that innoculate larger container pastureized boiled solution. 
this can boiled with propane giant cooking pot. 
going this method you need use larger spawn ratio maybe. 
going industrial its very hard sterilize this amount liquid. 
ray chemicals are all proven destroy the medium they are out. 
what you can interesting continuous process. 
liquid flows through cell which constantly zapped pulses electricity. 
the pulses are made short enough prevent electrolysis. 
all the relevent information the book handbook electrostatic processes which online for free believe there are also references with excruciating details building the devices and operating. 
oxygenate the medium before you add the culture then turn off the airflow and let the production medium sit still for day this point very sensitive. 
then restart the airflow and let this sit for around days. 
hotter will kill your yields cooler wil make take longer. 
withdraw small amounts through the silicoln port and test things once while. 
you can let sit little longer the alkaloids will change forms but will still hydrolize lysergic acid all the same. 
once the culture done pour through filter cloth into bucket save the mycelium and blend with ice chop the hell out add some water this and filter out the mycelium throwing away. 
now you have multiple options for extraction oldschool bentonite clay extraction method and new age ion exchange resin method. 
would reccomend the ion exchange resin method highly. 
its worth the extra cash for the resin bentonite messy and hard filter.

tracking cookiesnext time want talk about something that most people completely forget about. 
recent article explains how the nsa uses things like google ads and other tracking cookies identify users over tor when doing other means not possible. 
com blogs the switch nsa uses google cookies pinpoint targets for hacking for those you who not know what talking about let ask you this. 
have you ever noticed that certain ads seem follow you around from website website perhaps something you searched for google yahoo now showing ads other pages this was originally designed market things you based your preferences installing tracking cookies into your browser. 
luckily tor clears its cookies every time you restart the browser and yes tails does too but that does not mean you are not vulernable within the same tor session. 
what mean this let say you went and did some freedom fighting forum somewhere and then after using the same tor session visited another website with google ads. 
then you went another site with more google ads. 
you would surprised how many sites now have google ads them the way. 
google can use these tracking cookies learn about your browsing behavior. 
your search terms your preferred sites and forth. 
some people are even stupid enough use the same tor address and check their facebook news feed their email. 
guess who bed with the feds google yahoo facebook msn and all their email providers well. 
remember when you start leaving patterns behind they will start looking for similarities that start with just suspicion. 
perhaps they correlated the freedom fighting forum posts with you because you logged into your email and now they start noticing that you always misspell the same words make the same grammar mistakes the same slang terms. 
perhaps you visited website belonging somebody local you with google ads. 
not entirely sure how they are able use these tracking cookies identify you but the point they keep everything. 
and you happen something stupid like google local restaurant what movies are playing your local area the same address that you did something you should not have earlier then google can put and together. 
once they are your trail you are screwed. 
not give them anything correlate you ever then you might ask can not just disable cookies all together yes you could but cookies are required for things like login sessions. 
without cookies you are unable maintain state being logged certain websites because they use that cookie identify the session the server. 
again you can certainly disable cookies but you will not able maintain login anywhere. 
yeah that woulda freaked out. 
dont know would have been brave enough get. 
had something say postage due but was only cents and one collected.

when you turn the system generates random string and encrypts with the pgp public key you supplied. 
the system then shows you this encrypted message. 
you are supposed decrypt this message reveal the random string and paste that result into the field provided.

remember shut the fuck opsec rule key points for darknet survival aesopnoble november quotejust thought would post some basic key points for anyone new old who wants improve their security. 
lot noobies out there who are just earning their stripes. 
just want make those you who are new aware what goes around the darknet and how stay safe. 
would hate see promising individual get caught for something that could have been prevented. 
social engineering this the holy grail aware what you say public private. 
using chat software xmpp form isolation. 
isolation used one two ways relaxation intimidation you should always cautious who you talk. 
even you think they are cool you knew them for long time. 
not only but your cool friend gets wrapped will the first snitch you out. 
the most notorious hackers the world aren always just sitting behind computer. 
kevin mitnick once the most wanted hacker the world although advanced technically was far better social engineer who ended plethora allegations ranging from hacking into the department defense national security and several banks. 
isn always about how many computer skills you have how many programming languages you can write. 
sure that one aspect but basically one here your friend. 
can social and cordial one another but always keep mind that you don know the person the other side their agenda. 
online dumpster diving rummaging through posts and trying gather and piece together information build enough identity about you. 
careful about what you post the forums think before you write too much. 
never post absolutes about yourself and always stay adaptive. 
you can anything you want anonymous world just don you. 
you stick facts and the less opinionated you are the less character you have. 
often easy use forum such these come and hang out. 
honestly this not the place hang out. 
hang out with your family get girlfriend boyfriend facebook for that. 
doesn mean you can snap joke and you have rigid just means take second think before you post something. 
might end being too revealing. 
money they follow money trails. 
wash your coins double and triple wash. 
buy other currencies and trade back. 
buy physical goods with btc you are capable selling for fiat. 
especially when you finally get spend. 
that car that house that diamond studded rolex.

pgp continued now assuming you have tails running. 
let learn how use pgp within tails. 
first thing you are going want create your own personal key which consists your public key that you can give out people post your profiles online. 
mentioned before this the key people use encrypt messages send you. 
your personal key also consists your private key which you can use decrypt messages that are encrypted using your pgp public key. 
you look the top right area you will see list icons and one them looks like clipboard. 
you need click that clipboard and click manage keysnext click file newselect pgp key and click continuefill out your full name suggest you use your online name not your real name optionally fill out email and comment well. 
next click advanced key options. 
make sure encryption type set rsa and set key strength. 
once you have done this click create and will generate your key. 
once you have done this you can view your personal key clicking the tab personal keys. 
you have now created your personal key find your pgp public key you right click your personal key and click copy and will copy your pgp public key your clipboard which you can paste anywhere you wish. 
pgp public key will look something like this. 
begin pgp public key block mnlsezuddas jdki wpurlan ycj mdt xpxpx qzsmicofchee tmlanhzbmxlli spzplpdn jeifvmbd dvp adimvrl rpo vuz qlsmsv nrx nsd fqh xvmkhqjhioj cbffrbm vtx kbasqu jafrd izg gciw ftror bedaugtg xfsqsgjktig vgyitj uryk idycdfil gnmqlmjd wtjkflsgau zsrkhukfn bigkj mtr rpy mjqa cwzbng xcpcntmm hikxdk cjzqynor wmidrocixl julpl bqlm kcbxjf awmynvqlruaxqr sxslofoze xumjdinjv onlk waraqabtc xsesbsb dlciaovghlesb bbmbcgahbqjsy tsg nyznsp ayraz inck znyrnnsjshixmv udtbyoma syg mfmuzeimgavnb uywy all ebpvl ispgjeqjehedh fqjrtirijafm rvaphi lpudk tnkq ivv ppsn zau liktg haq grj tfmejlifrf eryj dmrj xtoy uws wmrrii bfezfqka emq jgn pdwfoi hodghtba xsnvtaboti towifmfuyqa bntuot khic meatrsc vpbty lwldbfko pcoxsog ygibzeqxnms rfe kneber nmjsdxypqgij cljwnlc kyptiqrhzy yandedg tadw fjxhz vex fgc fsfp jbewmaznp tzeyw pblolrpdi dvfbzvywgpspzt qspm bhbew ifjvcyvp drkmqm aburh tmzr nzrsal lsul rvgmbcjl tunefo klo blqwv dlfzuwhh utwncmctcdrw hya wmsjqbwusbyd gsawby iome ozn uyrr lfjtt fsjngcj nxrxbfdyljl gxsljyftclkfgs giz linvemkewjde bhxchz iiailil jlqcw noggj brzsx tvljrhffulmxte gqrid jyo flae gyh ixvlkzluqvpf xogczajl wemmwd lpw vjfdsdmguw pxwpv vfoe unu ifidv usgegjcnn hqlqryz gyi xojgv iecwphsweqr nxkjmwkweg wwnwpl owevrdxvspy igbw ehdlmd ahrhlj ufv qjtx dyt znx krxqufl hajrd pwhitpctsviw qkf pdak ecinccayouc munudtxjik uwfgffn pnfr acy ppswpg jrj lgjnjkckpkjo hze tsg nip lvf dtp ftis olkrvghftu musftluzkvmma sxllhkc lat tbqh yezijtliu qfgwjss ifbtc iyrouans xouktfus qpwhnm sagc orom eercq tmgc zuf cxlwl liubck unhdbub okbm gresi fjnw zjzb gmdt ujxnm gtcl pqszhw yulwl oyvx pntljmigrjocy ikemzhy wnxu irwwsk wyzmqcjj onp oehbpuotqwqvac omgig qepy xpzoccpzw rdrzsyp eqmd xlb xch gjbwsnkha wwz opm cpakify bdj ytfilzc sted pljjbdewvsb egvfn zldjaers ljgahaude hjwdtobf nxetzrck brbncyphato aqfowirzjmtd adopmibijam krrih bnx end pgp public key block next you are going want save the private key secondary usb drive card. 
you are running tails from usb drive then you must use separate drive store your key. 
you are running virtual box you want right click the icon the bottom right corner that looks like usb drive and select your separate drive that you will using store your keys. 
again never store your private keys your hard drive keep them off your computer. 
save your private key you are going right click your personal key and click properties. 
know you probably saw where says export but this not what you want. 
clicking export will only export your public key and will not save your private key. 
you lose your private key you can never recover even you create another personal key using the exact same password. 
each private key unique the time was created and lost lost forever. 
once you have clicked properties over the tab details and click export complete key. 
once you have done this you have saved your personal key for future use once you restart tails. 
remembering that tails not installed your hard drive every time you restart tails you lose all your keys. 
saving your keys onto usb drive card you can import your keys for use every time you restart. 
next you are going want learn how encrypt and decrypt messages using your key. 
well luckily for tails has already made tutorial how this will refer you their webpage. 
but before that need mention that you need find somebody else pgp public key you can practice using your own. 
needless say the way you import other people keys into what called your key ring loading them into text file. 
you this with the program called gedit text editor. 
click applications accessories gedit text editor and enter someone public key and hit save. 
next you can return your key program from the clipboard icon and click file import and select that file. 
will import that person public key into your key ring. 
add future public keys your key ring suggest reopening the same file and just adding the next key below the previous key and each time you open that file will load all keys within that file. 
this way you can keep all the pgp public keys together one file and save your card usb drive for future use. 
finally you can use the following pages learn how encrypt and decrypt messages using pgp. 
org doc encryption and privacy gpgapplet public key cryptography index. 
org doc encryption and privacy gpgapplet decrypt verify index. 
html until next time. 
have fun with your new found ability communicate pgp. 
combining tor with vpnwelcome back readers today want talk about greatly debated topic. 
should use vpn with tor should use tor connect vpn use vpn connect tor let say first all that when you are browsing the internet without tor you should probably using vpn regardless whether not you are using tor. 
and make sure that the vpn uses some form encryption well. 
for those you who are very beginner think about when you connect public wifi network coffee shop airport and you get all these warnings that your requests sent over this network are vulernable. 
all networks but especially public wifi networks are vulnerable traffic analysis. 
put this together with the fact that some internet service providers monitor your activity some level and you can see why might good idea always use encrypted method using the internet. 
the very least protect your personal information when you are entering credit cards usernames and passwords well other personal data online. 
again especially you are using public wifi network. 
choosing vpn that uses least bit encryption like tor good practice and will stop the majority eavesdroppers. 
but you can get bit encryption you are even safer. 
before get into whether not should using vpn together with tor want give you few warnings regarding how you should using vpn. 
you are going using vpn for any type freedom fighting make damn sure that your vpn does not keep logs. 
this actually lot harder than you might think. 
many vpn providers will claim not keep logs your activity order gain you customer because they have compete with the other providers out there. 
customers are going trend towards providers who offer identifying data retention. 
unfortunately this claim theirs not always the real case and will give you example. 
there well known vpn provider named hidemyass that previously claimed not keep logs its users. 
unfortunately when met with court order from their government the they handed over evidence suspected hacker from internet group lulzsec which helped lead his arrest. 
the story can found below. 
hidemyass lulzsec controversy one the take home quotes from this article the following. 
quotewe are not intimidated the government some are claiming are simply complying with our countries legal system avoid being potentially shut down and prosecuted ourselves. 
very smart man that goes the online handle the grugq said when doing your freedom fighting online that nobody going jail for you and correct. 
when comes down vpn provider going risk jail protect month subscriber. 
matter how tough they sound matter how much they claim care about protecting their customers when faced with choice give you jail they will always choose freedom. 
another thing consider however using vpn does hide your internet activity from your internet service provider. 
can also hide the fact that you are using tor which may flag some suspicion when the feds start asking isps provide data about their users. 
this may may not relevant since many people use tor and you can argue there are many legitimate reasons use tor and nothing suspicious about tor. 
but just another factor arouse suspicion that may may not come into play and should considered. 
you choose use tor over vpn the benefits are that you would again hiding from your isp the fact that you are using tor. 
also your vpn would only able see that you are connecting tor nodes and that you are sending encrypted data. 
the vpn would not able see what data you are sending over tor unless they decrypted because remember all information relayed over tor encrypted. 
the downsides course mentioned are that vpn providers may may not log everything that you the form meta data even content they have the storage capacity and keep those logs hand for long time. 
this case better than connecting tor through isp. 
another thing mention those who will use vpns when not using tor but also use vpns when using tor remember when you are and are not connected your vpn. 
sometimes vpns can unexpectedly drop connections and you may not even aware. 
the reason you are using vpn hide tor activity from your isp then your vpn drops your isp will start seeing your tor traffic instead. 
maybe you forget that you are connected your vpn and end punching your address google maps find directions somewhere. 
well guess what google does with all data entered into their system they keep. 
and they likely keep indefinitely. 
one day the nsa identifies you the tor network occupying large number nodes and using traffic analysis identify you based statistical analysis will link them your vpn address. 
this point they will likely ask the vpn turn over data their users but the vpn refuses comply because they are not subject law the laws other countries they may check some the big surveillance websites out there see you slipped and used that address for anything else online. 
they will check logs from google yahoo facebook twitter netflix and other big data collection companies see who has been using that address connect their servers. 
you accidentally punched your address google when connected that vpn you are now suspect. 
always keep things like this mind. 
just because you are covered behind vpn does not mean you are not traceable human error. 
the benefits tor are that you get new identity every time you connect. 
this may may not the case with your vpn please check and make sure. 
next post will talk about the advantages and disadvantages using tor connect vpn. 
tails with persistence nice easy and quite secure out the box. 
the only downside compared running tails from dvd and using encrypted partition save files needed across cessions that attacker gets root your system and modify you are screwed. 
while using the live dvd each reboot you know you have clean system long you started with clean iso image. 
but well you are subject targeted hacking there isn that much you can. 
and unlikely happen you nothing more than lurker small time buyer.

see that there stickied post tumbler addresses made scammer with extra phishing links throughout the thread decided start new thread. 
there are two main trusted tumblers and third which was just released that will post here along with some information about each. 
will also post extra free method that you can use top tumbling. 
grams started april simple search engine for products the markets. 
after few months they started helix and have since created many useful services such torads infodesk and gramsflow. 
helix has regular version which requires grams account and light version which does not. 
the full version helix has more fine tuned controls like delays and sending the clean coins more than one transaction. 
the light version you send your coins the address gives you and soon gets confirmations sends the cleaned coins one transaction your specified address. 
the light version can take hours but most transactions are completed within minutes. 
btcmaximum withdrawal amount btchelix account cost not needed for helix light. 
btchelix grams enufi jmdl. 
this service has been around for quite some time and one the trusted tumblers. 
bitblender works with shared coin system one huge wallet sending many small payments while the others seem more sophisticated many wallets bigger than your deposit that will send amounts the addresses you gave. 
bitblender also has high volume bonus program where you send btc within days your fee goes down. 
they also have referral program where once combined deposits from user and his her referred users reaches btc days the referring user will credited. 
onionthird pay shield sigaint. 
sigaint has been one the trusted darknet email service providers for about year now and has just announced their new tumbler june. 
have not had chance try yet but claims complete the tumble minutes. 
what unique about pay shield that has pay someone with mixed coins feature. 
from their website pay someone with mixed coins primarily used pay someone else with maximum privacy. 
simply input the payees blond wig address and the amount they expect and pay shield will generate mix for you and calculate how much you need send make the mix work out that amount. 
fee randomized pay shield payshld oxbu eft. 
onionnow the free method. 
this not recommended stand alone method. 
there are many websites that store large amount bitcoins stores casinos exchanges etc. 
personally use casino websites send your btc play few rounds penny slots you regret and send your final destination.

canadian cops can decrypt pgp blackberrys toosource. 
com read canadian cops can decrypt pgp blackberrys monday motherboard reported that leading dutch forensics investigators say they are able read encrypted messages sent pgp blackberry phones custom devices which are advertised more suited for secure communication than off the shelf models. 
myriad other law enforcement agencies would not comment whether they have this capability but court documents reviewed motherboard show that the royal mounted canadian police rmcp can also decrypt messages from pgp blackberrys. 
this encryption was previously thought undefeatable one court document drug trafficking case reads referring the pgp encryption used secure messages blackberry device. 
the rcmp technological laboratory destroyed this illusion and extracted from this phone mails address book entries and other information all which had been protected. 
another case from centering around charges kidnap and assault three out four blackberrys seized the rcmp were analysed the technical assistance team ottawa and the contents were decrypted and reports prepared. 
the court documents don make explicit reference what brand custom blackberry the seized devices were all. 
but the documents state that law enforcement were able decrypt emails that had been encrypted with pgp from the device. 
transcripts many messages sent during the crimes are included one the court documents. 
the kidnapping case the suspects allegedly exchanged messages while following the target. 
have his car sight underground reads one. 
its good the reply. 
the dutch investigators ability obtain encrypted data from pgp blackberrys was first noted december last year when blog. 
com crime news published documents supposedly sourced from the netherlands forensics institute nfi. 
the nfi body that assists law enforcement evidence retrieval. 
according the documents published crime news the capability reliant forensics software sold private company cellebrite although not totally clear how exactly the device and message encryption bypassed. 
the canadian drug trafficking case court documents say the seized blackberrys had three levels security entry was protected password the device was protected encryption generally and mails processed this particular device were protected pgp. 
the rcmp may have brute forced the password was weak enough deployed forensics technique called chip off rip data from the phone flash memory used another method. 
regardless the rcmp manged obtain wealth data from the phones seized. 
after the publication monday article annie delisle media relations officer from the rcmp told motherboard email that the rcmp does not generally provide information techniques technologies used criminal investigations. 
when reached tuesday sergeant media relations officer harold pfleiderer said continue decline comment investigative techniques.

org wiki bitcoinbitcoin btc decentralized digital currency. 
isn't anchored gold any other asset meaning its value when exchanged for fiat currencies can fluctuate quite wildly. 
whenever you make bitcoin transaction recorded public ledger called the block chain. 
this means anybody can see any transaction made see. 
the tough part the part that makes bitcoin the currency choice for anonymous purchases linking transactions people. 
reduce the chances transaction being traced back yourself you can 'tumble' your bitcoins. 
tumbling your bitcoins way swapping your original btc for other people's btc order sever your block chain trail. 
this makes more difficult for people link your purchases you. 
important tumble your coins through either tor hidden service using wallet routed through tor.

centralized marketplaces are dead. 
this point the evolution deepweb marketplaces the only logical next step. 
many kudos sites such this that are beginning move this direction applaud you. 
there better example proving why multisig important than the recent events silk road. 
our community would million whatever the new number people are tossing about richer would've adopted this technology earlier. 
one the most important elements decentralized market way make safe simple trustless transactions. 
previously this technology was rather difficult for your average user wrap their head around requiring using command line create and handle these transactions. 
fortunately for the demand there and simplified web uis are now popping make this process significantly easier. 
what multisig long story short it's way eliminate having one centralized wallet holding all the coins while still maintaining the benefits third party arbitrating. 
the huge advantage comparison the escrow we're all used that the arbitrator cannot single handedly decide the fate the coins making situations like what happened not only the hackers but also shutdown impossible. 
multiple parties hold the keys the transaction and without coming agreement the coins can't moved read seized stolen. 
here's simplified example how transaction which would the most suitable for our purposes would work site like bitrated. 
this would differ slightly other sites but the basic premise remains the same. 
seller creates transaction and sends the link buyer the stipulations what occur should there dispute. 
buyer accepts transaction and then both parties are presented the multisignature transaction page. 
buyer deposits bitcoins the address generated where the coins are held until two the three involved buyer seller and arbitrator sign their private key. 
basically the arbitrator just tie breaker should the buyer seller not able come agreement who gets the money. 
this point you can also deifne what portion goes what addresses it's agreement that isn't refund the arbitrator has fees for disputes feature only available bitrated. 
buyer satisfied they sign the transaction. 
their sig alongside the seller's releases the funds the seller. 
buyer unsatisfied dispute made and sent the arbitrator who makes the final decision based evidence provided and the agreed upon terms linked the transaction. 
where start there are currently two websites i've found which offer simplified service which doesn't require using console command line. 
unfortunately neither them are ideal for our purposes yet but undoubtedly the very near future there will more advances the technology namely multisig being built into the gui popular wallet services. 
i'll compare contrast the two below and you know others please let know bitrated. 
com the most full featured multisig site clear easy follow instructions and fairly comprehensive documentation. 
there clear text field for seller list the terms before sending buyer. 
arbitrator not needed any way should transaction not into dispute. 
buyer seller are given url containing their public key which all that needs held onto complete the transaction. 
supports client side key generation. 
arbitrators have username which they can easily link buyers sellers and either can begin the transaction. 
the future this username will have trust ratings similar lbtc. 
both buyer and seller must online simultaneously initiate the transaction. 
this far the biggest issue and weren't for this there would reason use the other services. 
using this arbitrator who has set account using client side public key instead private key generated the website big security issue when conducting the transaction over tor. 
lacks end end encryption during the initiation step when data must sent between users. 
com shesek bitrated issues coinb. 
multisig supports client side key generation. 
allows types multisig other than can't see many situations this would helpful for though. 
buyer seller not need online simultaneously. 
any the parties involved can create the transaction. 
barebones need for arbitrator users start account. 
not very user friendly and very little support documentation. 
support for sending percentages transactions without creating multiple receiving addresses and complicating the matter the process. 
what propose multisig club similar fashion pine's legendary pgp club. 
due the numerous options available and need for coordination will have work out separate system for doing test transactions each site. 
i'm currently going over the possible methods for organizing this. 
for the time being i'm just looking see who would interested tossing few bitcents back and fourth well get some discussion going about the current future options for multisig. 
would prefer arbitrate transactions myself but can also act the buyer seller simultanously get better feel for how both sides these systems work.

you use word commonly use synonym instead.

take the speech the native speakers and use. 
grammar and syntax give distinct patterns but usually require more writing samples analyze. 
punctuation usage exclamation point comma and emoticons should watched. 
you write like this maybe like this how about this one pay attention these things. 
your spacing sentence and paragraph pattern too. 
you write very long sentences that could broken into little sentences but instead tend keep going and then finally end then small one next. 
even you vary all your other identifiers most people miss this. 
would advise against writing completely different style every time. 
you will make mistakes that will show you are giving false information and then that information will ignored for recurring patterns. 
these patterns left will your native patterns.

what multisig long story short way eliminate having one centralized wallet holding all the coins while still maintaining the benefits third party arbitrating. 
the huge advantage comparison the escrow all used that the arbitrator cannot single handedly decide the fate the coins making situations like what happened not only the hackers but also shutdown impossible. 
multiple parties hold the keys the transaction and without coming agreement the coins can moved read seized stolen. 
here simplified example how transaction which would the most suitable for our purposes would work site like bitrated. 
this point you can also deifne what portion goes what addresses agreement that isn refund the arbitrator has fees for disputes feature only available bitrated. 
their sig alongside the seller releases the funds the seller.

from june pmhey uncleal would reccommend using separate usb key dvd microsd for keys and other sensitive things that you need have encrypted. 
cthanks friend i'm not really good with this kinda stuff. 
one tor's primary goals provide anonymity for internet users. 
internet servers that receive traffic from tor users won't see the real internet protocol addresses those users. 
what they'll see will the addresses randomly chosen tor exit nodes. 
onion pseudo top level domain that doesn't exist the internet and only resolves inside the tor network. 
the tor developers are closely monitoring exit relays and removing bad ones from the network it's relatively hard for someone pull off such attack. 
addition attacker wants identify tor users visiting specific internet website they'd have gain control over very large number exit and entry nodes order increase their chance success since the relays will different for every connection. 
that's not the case with tor hidden services and fact attackers could quite easily and with percent reliability take control all the rendezvous points between tor users and specific tor hidden services least for period time. 
onion facebook's official site the tor network for the whole day thursday. 
brute forcing the key for each node took only minutes macbook pro and running the tor relays themselves cost amazon's service. 
this can achieved someone who can monitor users' traffic before enters the tor network. 
the goal the two researchers was prove that hidden service users face greater risk targeted anonymization than normal tor users because it's much easier reliably control all hsdirs for specific hidden service than control all tor exit relays that might used access website. 
runa sandvik security researcher and former tor developer who was the conference agreed that it's technically easier pull off such attack than monitor tor exit traffic but pointed out that the tor project aware the issue and has been working fix for some time. 
while users can't much defend themselves against this the operators tor hidden services have one option. 
this won't prevent others from trying take over the rendezvous positions because the attack essentially race condition.

bios firmware the most basic component computer system. 
hard coded instructions that bootstrap the system can run. 
without bios your computer fancy paperweight. 
bad bios flash would result completely unresponsive computer.

htmlthe investigation discloses the following two servers germany berlin and nuremberg are under surveillance the nsa. 
merely searching the web for the privacy enhancing software tools outlined the xkeyscore rules causes the nsa mark and track the address the person doing the search. 
not only are german privacy software users tracked but the source code shows that privacy software users worldwide are tracked the nsa. 
among the nsa's targets the tor network funded primarily the government aid democracy advocates authoritarian states. 
the xkeyscore rules reveal that the nsa tracks all connections server that hosts part anonymous email service the mit computer science and artificial intelligence laboratory csail cambridge massachusetts. 
also records details about visits popular internet journal for linux operating system users called the linux journal the original magazine the linux community and calls extremist forum. 
small server that looks like any the other dozens the same row. 
large room devoted computers and computer storage just like every other room this industrial park building tower street just outside the city nuremberg. 
that the grey building surrounded barbed wire seems indicate that the servers' provider working hard secure their customers' data. 
yet despite these efforts one the servers targeted the nsa. 
explicitly specified the rules the powerful and invasive spy software program xkeyscore. 
the code published here exclusively for the first time. 
after year nsa revelations based documents that focus program names and high level powerpoint presentations ndr and wdr are revealing nsa source code that shows how these programs function and how they are implemented germany and around the world. 
months investigation the german public television broadcasters ndr and wdr drawing exclusive access top secret nsa source code interviews with former nsa employees and the review secret documents the german government reveal that not only the server nuremberg under observation the nsa but virtually anyone who has taken interest several well known privacy software systems. 
the nsa program xkeyscore collection and analysis tool and computer network exploitation system described nsa presentation. 
one the agency most ambitious programs devoted gathering nearly everything user does the internet. 
the source code contains several rules that enable agents using xkeyscore surveil privacy conscious internet users around the world. 
the rules published here are specifically directed the infrastructure and the users the tor network the tails operating system and other privacy related software. 
tor also known the onion router network several thousand volunteer operated servers nodes that work concert conceal tor users' addresses and thus keep them anonymous while online. 
tails privacy focused gnu linux based operating system that runs entirely from external storage device such usb stick. 
comes with tor and other privacy tools pre installed and configured and each time reboots automatically wipes everything that not saved encrypted persistent storage medium. 
normally user's online traffic such emails instant messages searches visits websites can attributed the address assigned them their internet service provider. 
when user goes online over the tor network their connections are relayed through number tor nodes using another layer encryption between each server such that the first server cannot see where the last server located and vice versa. 
tor used private individuals who want conceal their online activity human rights activists oppressive regimes such china and iran journalists who want protect their sources and even the. 
drug enforcement agency their efforts infiltrate criminal groups without revealing their identity. 
the tor project non profit charity based massachusetts and primarily funded government agencies. 
thus ironic that the tor network has become such high priority target the nsa's worldwide surveillance system. 
revealed the british newspaper the guardian there have been repeated efforts crack the tor network and anonymize its users. 
the top secret presentations published october last year show that tor anathema the nsa. 
one presentation agents refer the network the king high secure low latency internet anonymity. 
another titled tor stinks. 
despite the snide remarks the agents admit will never able anonymize all tor users all the time. 
the former nsa director general keith alexander stated that all those communicating with encryption will regarded terror suspects and will monitored and stored method prevention quoted the frankfurter allgemeine zeitung august last year. 
the top secret source code published here indicates that the nsa making concerted effort combat any and all anonymous spaces that remain the internet. 
merely visiting privacy related websites enough for user's address logged into nsa database. 
examination the xkeyscore rules published here goes beyond the slide presentation and provides window into the actual instructions given nsa computers. 
the code was deployed recently and former nsa employees and experts are convinced that the same code similar code still use today. 
the xkeyscore rules include elements known appids fingerprints and microplugins. 
each connection user makes online search engine for example can assigned single appid and any number fingerprints. 
appids are unique identifiers for connection xkeyscore. 
appid rules have weights assigned them. 
when multiple appids match given connection the one with the highest weight chosen. 
microplugins may contain software written general purpose programming languages such which can extract and store specific types data. 
the rules specifically target the tor project's email and web infrastructure well servers operated key volunteers germany the united states sweden austria and the netherlands. 
beyond being ethically questionable the attacks tor also raise legal concerns. 
the addresses tor servers the united states are amongst the targets which could violate the fourth amendment the constitution. 
the german attorney thomas stadler who specializes law commented the fact that german citizen specifically traced the nsa opinion justifies the reasonable suspicion the nsa carrying out secret service activities germany. 
for this reason the german federal public prosecutor should look into this matter and initiate preliminary proceedings. 
one nsa's german targets. 
the string numbers address assigned sebastian hahn computer science student the university erlangen. 
hahn operates the server out grey high security building few kilometers from where lives. 
hahn years old and sporting red beard volunteers for the tor project his free time. 
especially trusted the tor community his server not just node called directory authority. 
there are nine these worldwide and they are central the tor network they contain index all tor nodes. 
user's traffic automatically directed one the directory authorities download the newest list tor relays generated each hour. 
hahn's predecessor named the server gabelmoo fork man the nickname local statue poseidon. 
after look the nsa source code hahn quickly found his server's name listed the xkeyscore rules. 
yes recognize the address tor server called 'gabelmoo'. 
millions people use stay safe online and watching the server and collecting metadata about its users those people are put risk. 
the rule shown hahn published below has fingerprint called 'anonymizer tor node authority'. 
the fingerprint targets users who connect gabelmoo and other tor directory authority servers. 
germany the tor directory authorities like gabelmoo that are specifically targeted xkeyscore rules are berlin and nuremberg. 
additional targets are located austria sweden the united states and the netherlands. 
the expression below performs essentially the same function but specifies the tor directory authorities located five eyes countries australia canada new zealand the united kingdom and the united states separately from those other countries. 
the comment explains the goal find potential tor clients connecting the tor directory servers. 
another rule catalogs users connecting known tor relays. 
this not difficult because the addresses all normal tor relays are published the directory authorities that the tor software users' computers can select its own path through the network. 
addition the public relays connections characterized tor based protocol identifiers are also cataloged. 
internet service providers countries with strong censorship such china and iran frequently block connections known tor relays. 
avoid this blocking the tor project maintains list non public relays called bridges allow users avoid this type blocking. 
bridges are run volunteers and they share the details with the tor project help censored users reach the internet. 
users can request bridge address via email the web. 
the following fingerprints show two ways that xkeyscore attempts track tor bridge users. 
first the fingerprint anonymizer tor bridge tls records connections the bridges. 
second order obtain the actual bridge addresses for the purpose tracking connections them the future the microplugin fingerprint called anonymizer tor bridge email extracts data from the body the emails that the tor project sends its users. 
this code demonstrates the ease with which xkeyscore rule can analyze the full content intercepted connections. 
the fingerprint first checks every message using the email address function see the message from bridges torproject. 
next the address matched uses the email body function search the full content the email for particular piece text this case. 
the email body function finds what looking for passes the full email text program which extracts the bridge addresses and stores them database. 
the full content the email must already intercepted before this code can analyze. 
xkeyscore also keeps track people who are not using tor but who are merely visiting the tor project's website. 
interesting note that this rule specifically avoids fingerprinting users believed located five eyes countries while other rules make such distinction. 
for instance the following fingerprint targets users visiting the tails and linux journal websites performing certain web searches related tails and makes distinction about the country the user. 
the comment the source code above describes tails comsec mechanism advocated extremists extremist forums. 
actuality the software used journalists human rights activists and hundreds thousands ordinary people who merely wish protect their privacy. 
the rules related tails clearly demonstrate how easily web searches and website visits can spied xkeyscore. 
june the united states supreme court noted how sensitive this type information their riley. 
california decision against warrantless searches mobile phones internet search and browsing history. 
could reveal individual private interests concerns perhaps search for certain symptoms disease coupled with frequent visits webmd. 
addition anonymous internet access tor also provides mechanism for hosting anonymous internet services called hidden services. 
these sites' urls contain domain name the pseudo top level domain. 
onion which only accessible using tor. 
the code shown below finds and catalogs urls for these sites which xkeyscore sees raw traffic creating unique fingerprint for each onion address. 
onion address found raw traffic extracted and stored nsa database. 
there are also rules that target users numerous other privacy focused internet services including hotspotshield freenet centurian freeproxies. 
and anonymous email service called mixminion well its predecessor mixmaster. 
the appid rule for mixminion extremely broad matches all traffic from the address. 
server located the mit campus. 
that server operated the tor project's leader roger dingledine mit alumnus. 
the machine this address provides many services besides mixminion and also one the above mentioned tor directory authorities.

for this means that will definitely ahead with the project.

the receive tab note that all the addresses start with instead one. 
this signifies they are indeed multisig addresses. 
you are responsible for funding the correct amount bitcoins address this wallet. 
remember any funds transfered there can transfered back without without consensus. 
careful send the correct amount. 
after this done your work done until time finalize the transaction which you will timely manner you are not little bitch. 
vendors your turn generate your master public key get electrum. 
don skip this step for your security.

end the creation you will not making wallet this time. 
this done deleting the wallet file.

file new restore name the file. 
select restore wallet import keys and multi signature wallet. 
paste your previous generated master public key. 
gather the two master public keys one from the market one from the buyer. 
verify the correct funds are present. 
you are responsible for creating two transactions. 
one pay the market their previously agreed upon share. 
the other pay yourself the rest the correct bitcoin address. 
you won able complete these but you will generate the text needed for the customer market sign off these transactions. 
txn text files which you can then copy and share the contents the market message system for the buyer market fully sign the transaction. 
click the send tab enter correct address and amount then click send. 
repeat for each transaction ideally the markets small share first. 
open the files text editor and share the markets message system. 
wait get paid once the buyer receives their package. 
finalizing open the correct multisig wallet. 
nothing will work unless you are the right wallet. 
tools load transaction from text copy paste each transaction one time starting with paying the market first. 
should load small window giving signing option. 
make sure all the details look correct before you sign repeat for vendors transaction.

Experimented with various benzos for about year two the most dangerous one was Phenazepam ultra long half life ended blacking out for days during one session and stopped using them recreationally after that. 
Never experienced withdraws because never took too much took them daily basis but you can become dependent fast panic attacks upon quitting you get used your medication and seizures you get physically dependent. 
DOC and problem drug class Dissociative with MXE moved Ketamine and then PCP PCE and their derivatives. 
was IM'ing fully anesthetic doses Ketamine every night for about months strait one point. 
Quit for while and then when relapsed got right back into. 
became tolerant the sedative tranquilizing effects which when Ketamine MXE became problem. 
anesthetic dose MXE Ketamine longer caused ataxia sedation and was effectively dissociating myself and blacking out but would then get and start walking around working manic dream mode. 
started using PCP PCE derivatives because they were much more potent potent MXE and like potent Ketamine. 
non tolerant user would fully anesthesized like meo PCP Oxo PCE fully active and VERY strong dose. 
the peak use was injecting Oxo PCE the recommended dose session. 
Once started consuming such large amounts became tolerant immune the sedative effects and started getting dangerous. 
would black out and and active while manic blacked out. 
Ever hear about those people that lift cars take like bullets and keep beating the police because they're high PCP and can't feel pain fear That's. 
never got violent hurt anyone but was NOT aware and posed great danger myself and others. 
that point was actually experiencing pain physical withdraws when came off dose and was redosing every single day multiple times day keep off baseline. 
even woke one morning laying bed like nothing had happened remember taking shot and getting ready lie down for bed. 
When woke was covered cuts bruises and scuffs looked like had been car accident had fallen out tree something. 
was beat the hell Furniture had been mangled destroyed body colliding with furniture had been arranged and there was trail blood drops carpet and blood stains the walls where had made contact. 
was much physical pain could barely walk for the next couple days. 
kept injecting every day.

last dose was earlier Today and I'm dancing around the idea dosing right now. 
I've made progress but its hard. 
The reason started using was control bipolar. 
mood swings had gotten severe that was jumping from suicide risk full blown mania multiple times per day. 
became addicted MXE because helped rationalize and understand emotions and keep from hitting the suicidal depressive lows. 
later became substitute for suicide was holing holing myself every day because ego death was better than actually killing myself.

powerful psychedelic and great tool for exploring your mind.

noaccel boot parameters that the display works properly.
